citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30pm on
13-Aug-19.
Knocked on door. No answer. Called phone number and left a message. Waited 30 minutes and then left.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30pm on
13-Aug-19.
Knocked on door.  No answer.  Called phone number and left a message.  Waited 30 minutes and then left.
